name: test_e2e_with_logs[PATH_DOT_006]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `PATH_DOT_006` |
| **Name** | Apache log file access |
| **Category** | PATH |
| **Subcategory** | dot_dot_slash |
| **Severity** | `MEDIUM` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `../../var/log/apache2/access.log`
- **Encoded**: `../../var/log/apache2/access.log`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Rule ID** | `ADV_PATH_001` |
| **Expected Rule** | Advanced Path Traversal Attack |
| **Actual Rule** | [NGINX Traversal] Basic path traversal attack detected test_id=PATH_DOT_006-1765108352228-dkmfbs pattern_id=PATH_DOT_006 uri=/?q=../../var/log/apache2/access.log client=127.0.0.1 |
| **Match Status** | `MISMATCH` |

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~7000ms
- **Timestamp**: 11:52:32.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence
